brandMini.title: From origin to skin health
brandMini.body: Kapunka began at the source—Moroccan cooperatives—then grew inside clinics. Our purpose is simple: transparent care that comforts the skin barrier and fits real routines.

methodMini.title: The Kapunka Method
bullets: Seal comfort with pure argan or blends

founderMini.title: Led by clinical practice
founderMini.body: Our founder’s work with dermatology and aesthetic teams shaped every routine. We keep claims cosmetic and results realistic—comfort, softness, visible calm.

sections.title: Heritage sourcing, clinic-grade standards
sections.text: We bottle single-origin argan oil within hours of pressing to lock in antioxidants. Every lot is microbiologically tested and traceable from kernel to bottle for spa and medical safety.

sections.title: From hammam rituals to modern recovery
sections.text: Pair our black soap cleanse, rose water mist, and argan concentrate for a three-step routine that calms inflammation, supports barrier repair, and leaves no heavy film.
